item.title: FortiGate SSH keys for administrative access
item.description: Introduction to SSH OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH protocol. It encrypts all traffic to eliminate eavesdropping, connection hijacking, and other attacks. That’s a cite from the official OpenSSH Webpage and also OpenSSH as for today is a very common type of connection to routers, switches, firewalls and so on. What we’re going to cover in this post is how to connect to a (FortiGate)[https://www.
